26079067-252a-4e9e-81e5-7fa179099107.description: This certification verifies that one learned the skills and competencies to develop an active network of current and emerging Indo-Pacific leaders who are innovative, culturally and technically competent and collaboratively address issues of common concern through the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center. It also verifies demonstrated evidence of successful application of these skills and competencies through delivery of an experiential leadership program.
26079067-252a-4e9e-81e5-7fa179099107.name: Developing and Equipping Leaders Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Recruit and train diverse emerging leaders from your community who possess a common desire to accelerate environmental resilience and sound governance efforts.
Design and deliver a transformational, experiential leadership program that supports emerging leaders with tools needed to solve complex issues.
Secure funding and partnerships with local communities, governments, institutions, and/or NGOs such as the East-West Center

a83bfa9c-eb57-4846-9560-8c68247246a7.description: This certification verifies that one learned the skills and competencies to generate just, community-based solutions and increase cooperation in climate & energy, water & rivers, disasters & emergencies, governance & development, agriculture & food, and oceans & fisheries through the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center. It also verifies demonstrated evidence of fostering these skills and competencies in other current and emerging Indo-Pacific leaders.
a83bfa9c-eb57-4846-9560-8c68247246a7.name: Fostering Environmental Solutions Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Contribute to and complete the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center
Demonstrate evidence of the application of the skills and competencies taught in the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center
Read and facilitate discussions of assigned program books and case studies in the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center

Demonstrate evidence of fostering the skills and competencies learned through the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center in other current and emerging Indo-Pacific leaders.
Actively engage in community service during the YSEALI Academic Fellowship on Environmental Issues at the East-West Center

3d08e968-5bff-47a3-b7dd-5a710a52b85a.description: The 2022 Circular Agriculture and Innovation Challenge is a virtual program primarily focusing on Agriculture and Circularity. The program includes an Innovation Challenge for young Southeast Asian people aged 18 - 35 to submit their initiatives and get the opportunities to gain small funding in order to kick off their innovative ideas toward circular agriculture. The program is organized by #EWCInnovationFellows, in partnership with East-West Center and YSEALI.
3d08e968-5bff-47a3-b7dd-5a710a52b85a.name: 2022 Circular Agriculture and Innovation Challenge - Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 3 days of virtual workshops on Circular Agriculture Innovation Challenge, Active Participation in Group Discussions

dded032c-e092-4881-9862-f149263adb50.description: Rhyme for Nature is a Songwriting and Slam Poetry Competition that aims to use music and poetry as an advocacy tool to highlight faith-based, cultural, and religious actions and initiatives of youths across Southeast Asia to show their performances about how their faith inspires and guides people to create environmental resilience, ecosystem health, and thriving biodiversity.
dded032c-e092-4881-9862-f149263adb50.name: RHYME FOR NATURE 2022 (Participation Appreciation)

badge_template_activities.title: The song or poetry can be in English or the local language with an English subtitle. The melody and lyrics shall be final once submitted. Contestant can use any musical instruments or vocals as accompaniment. Lyrics or Poetry content shall inspire new ways of seeing how faith can support environmental resilience through constructive action. The output shall also be creative and engaging.

d6c2174a-dc95-4e25-bb14-a296a3009920.description: Blue Tech Accelerator Program is a virtual program under #EWCSEAOPP and @OceanDecadeECOP for early-stage startups across Southeast Asia and Americas Countries that addresses ocean problems. The program seeks to inspire, empower and ignite the early-stage startup by providing mentors, insight, and connection to potential partners to accelerate their innovative ideas and business model in ocean-related technology & services to solve the problem faced by marine ecosystems and the oceans
d6c2174a-dc95-4e25-bb14-a296a3009920.name: BlueTech Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Attended at least 4 out of 5 weeks of the synchronous session of the Blue Tech Accelerator Program.
Completed all the assignments given during the Accelerator Program.
Pitched their own start up business model during the Tech Sprint Week.

ad6f6ac4-a6ba-434a-8b15-8b3b88775659.description: The 2022 Circular Agriculture and Innovation Challenge is a virtual program primarily focusing on Agriculture and Circularity. The program includes an Innovation Challenge for young Southeast Asian people aged 18 - 35 to submit their initiatives and get the opportunities to gain small funding in order to kick off their innovative ideas toward circular agriculture. The program is organized by #EWCInnovationFellows, in partnership with East-West Center and YSEALI.
ad6f6ac4-a6ba-434a-8b15-8b3b88775659.name: 2022 Circular Agriculture and Innovation Challenge - Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Participation on 2022 Circular Agriculture Innovation Challenge, Pitching Assessment on Circularity, Socio-Economic Value, and Design Process

c15fe4b0-f4b3-4e57-910d-7d82f7b3fe6c.description: Blue Tech Accelerator Program is a virtual program under #EWCSEAOPP and @OceanDecadeECOP for early-stage startups across Southeast Asia and Americas Countries that addresses ocean problems. The program seeks to inspire, empower and ignite the early-stage startup by providing mentors, insight, and connection to potential partners to accelerate their innovative ideas and business model in ocean-related technology & services to solve the problem faced by marine ecosystems and the oceans
c15fe4b0-f4b3-4e57-910d-7d82f7b3fe6c.name: BlueTech Volunteer Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Helped and supported in running the 5 weeks synchronous session of the Blue Tech Accelerator Program.
Completed and delivered all the assigned task as a volunteer.
Present and actively participated in the implementation of the entire Blue Tech Accelerator Program.

f51f6792-1e6c-4c3d-9dac-dfdb11876b21.description: The EWC Conservation Optimism Finalist is the badge for semi-finalists in Conservation Optimism Awards 2022. The semi-finalists are recognized for their efforts and inspiration in making positive contribution to the environment and their communities. The initiative will cultivate a community of Conservation Optimists via virtual training, webinar, certificate with digital badge in Conservation Optimism, regional awards competition and alumni network.
f51f6792-1e6c-4c3d-9dac-dfdb11876b21.name: Conservation Optimism Finalist

badge_template_activities.title: Acknowledged for their efforts in actively participated in Conservation Optimism Southeast Asia Award
Appreciated for their sharing of inspiring stories from 4 main categories and 5 fields
Celebrated for making positive differences to the environment and their communities

b14c5bec-842f-4a0a-8eab-88261b11d58c.description: This Winner Badge is awarded to the winner in air and climate category of Conservation Optimism Awards 2022. This award recognizes the efforts and achievements of Southeast Asians who made a positive difference to the environment and their communities by sharing their inspiring stories. The initiative will cultivate a community of Conservation Optimists via virtual training, webinar, certificate with digital badge in Conservation Optimism, regional awards competition and alumni network.
b14c5bec-842f-4a0a-8eab-88261b11d58c.name: Conservation Optimism Winner (Air and Climate Category)

badge_template_activities.title: Honored for the project's contribution in conservation optimism (air and climate category)
Acknowledged for the initiative's success stories and spread their inspiration through digital media
Celebrated for the effort in making positive differences to the environment and their communities

f44ba1a9-4550-4565-8a94-e9f57ae3c6c6.description: This Winner Badge is awarded to the winner in cities category of Conservation Optimism Awards 2022. This award recognizes the efforts and achievements of residents of Southeast Asia who made a positive difference to the environment and their communities by sharing their inspiring stories. 6cabb64c-a8aa-4b88-97b8-e31f914861c1.description: The EWC Earth Optimism Southeast Asia Awards will recognize the efforts and achievements of residents of Southeast Asia who made a positive difference to the environment and their communities through virtual training, digital badge certification and regional awards competition.
6cabb64c-a8aa-4b88-97b8-e31f914861c1.name: Earth Optimism Award

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in a virtual workshop on digital media and #EarthOptimism.
Received an an award that acknowledges and celebrates 20 impactful initiatives around Southeast Asia
Member of an online community of digital media young professionals

dfc8ba7f-1fe2-4298-bbdb-cb64a3d5ca97.description: Rhyme for Nature is a Songwriting and Slam Poetry Competition that aims to use music and poetry as an advocacy tool to highlight faith-based, cultural, and religious actions and initiatives of youths across Southeast Asia to show their performances about how their faith inspires and guides people to create environmental resilience, ecosystem health, and thriving biodiversity.
dfc8ba7f-1fe2-4298-bbdb-cb64a3d5ca97.name: RHYME FOR NATURE 2022 (Best Poetry Performance)

badge_template_activities.title: The song or poetry can be in English or the local language with an English subtitle. The melody and lyrics shall be final once submitted. Contestant can use any musical instruments or vocals as accompaniment. Lyrics or Poetry content shall inspire new ways of seeing how faith can support environmental resilience through constructive action. The output shall also be creative and engaging.

ae9b1310-9502-4fad-a383-48207bf6bd40.description: Blue Tech Accelerator Program is a virtual program under #EWCSEAOPP and @OceanDecadeECOP for early-stage startups across Southeast Asia and Americas Countries that ocean problems. The program seeks to inspire, empower and ignite the early-stage startup by providing mentors, insight, and connection to potential partners to accelerate their innovative ideas and business model in ocean-related technology and services to solve the problem faced by marine ecosystems and the oceans.
ae9b1310-9502-4fad-a383-48207bf6bd40.name: BlueTech Mentor Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Shared expertise in running the BlueTech Accelerator Program and mentored early-stage startups on ocean-related technology and services to solve the problem faced by marine ecosystems and the oceans.
